Java API for WordNet Searching (JAWS)

This document is the Java API for WordNet Searching (JAWS) specification.

See:
          Description

Packages
edu.smu.tspell.wordnet The content of this package represents the Java API for WordNet Searching (JAWS) public interface.
edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl Contains classes that may be usable for different database implementations (e.g. file, relational DBMS).
edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file Contains classes that provide a database implementation that retrieves information from the WordNet database files.
edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.synset Contains implementations of the various specific synset types.

 

This document is the Java API for WordNet Searching (JAWS) specification.
